snippet.title: Borderlands 2 - Sir Hammerlock introduces the Mechromancer
snippet.description:
Meet the Mechromancer, the new fifth playable class for Borderlands 2!  The Mechromancer is free to all Premiere Club preorder customers and $9.99 or 800 Microsoft Points on all platforms (PC/PS3/XB360).

Come hang out on the Official Borderlands Forums - http://gbxforums.gearboxsoftware.com/
Follow us out on Twitter - http://www.twitter.com/gearboxsoftware
Follow our publisher on Twitter - http://www.twitter.com/2KGames
Like us on Facebook - http://www.facebook.com/BorderlandsGame
